title: Kayem Foods Inc. Recalls Chicken Sausage Products Due To Misbranding
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 16, 2016 Kayem Foods Inc., a Chelsea, Mass. establishment, is recalling approximately 22,182 pounds of chicken sausage products due to misbranding, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products bear the incorrect nutritional labeling information and...
